definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: Ltd. is a company specializing in development, production and sales on audio equipment.
sentences.chinese: 公司主要從事專業音響器材的研製，生產及銷售。

sentences.english: In this paper, the formulae are indicated firstly to design artificial reverberator.
sentences.chinese: 文中首先引入運用電聲原理設計人工混響器的準則。
